attributes.action: Offer tax relief on membership fees for gyms/sports centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government states that it is serious about promoting active participation in sport in order to improve the health of the nation, but the membership fees of gyms and sports centres are prohibitive to many people. By offering basic rate tax relief on annual/monthly gym membership more prople will be encouraged to take up regular exercise, saving the NHS money.
